name: Kobold Survivors
description:
Hit fullscreen in the bottom right corner.

I powered through and made a game in only 24 hours, but at the end godot tripped and ate shit, and building the game crashes it. This older version works, but none of the powerups do anything except for greed, which increases HP.

The progress-through-failure mechanic is the level up screen: if you fail to keep your greed in check (and read the options in time) then it will auto-select "Greed",  and your kobold will eat all the gold and gain HP and get larger.

the Knife ability is supposed to shoot 3 projectiles forward and backward. The fireball ability is supposed to shoot five fireballs in a circle. getting the upgrade again adds more projectiles.
